dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9422 IH: Crypto Consumer Investor Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To prohibit lending, leveraging, or co-mingling customer funds by cryptocurrency exchanges without consent of a customer.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Crypto Consumer Investor Protection Act.
A cryptocurrency exchange may not lend, leverage, or co-mingle the funds of a customer without the consent of such customer.
